property.name: command
property.description: The command(s) to run. Need to be correctly formatted and escaped for the target platform. On Windows, the commands entered will be executed within a batch file. Use 'call' to invoke other batch files

property.name: undoCommand
property.description: If set, the command(s) to run to undo the execution of the command. May reference the same files as 'command'. On Windows, the commands entered will be executed within a batch file. Use 'call' to invoke other batch files
